truedefault1mdd77d32fe47b1021013eeb60e316d439c8679ef89cb21120000f8d856634c9c4fsp_instanceadmin2024-04-30 07:15:1977fe3afe47b1021013eeb60e316d43d62Paymentefeef8172f17b110622559a72799b675efeef8172f17b110622559a72799b675sp_instance_77fe3afe47b1021013eeb60e316d43d6admin2024-04-30 07:17:33Payment<html>
<head>
<meta charset="UTF-8">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<title>Payment Details</title>
</head>
<body>

<h2>Payment Details</h2>

<form action="/submit_payment" method="post">
  <label for="card_number">Card Number:</label><br>
  <input type="text" id="card_number" name="card_number" required><br>
  
  <label for="card_holder_name">Card Holder Name:</label><br>
  <input type="text" id="card_holder_name" name="card_holder_name" required><br>
  
  <label for="expiry_date">Expiry Date:</label><br>
  <input type="text" id="expiry_date" name="expiry_date" placeholder="MM/YYYY" required><br>
  
  <label for="cvv">CVV:</label><br>
  <input type="text" id="cvv" name="cvv" required><br>
  
  <input type="submit" value="Submit">
</form>

</body>
</html>

<h2>Payment Details</h2>

<form action="/submit_payment" method="post">
  <label for="card_number">Card Number:</label><br>
